author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Fearless Puppy Plays With Giant English Mastiff
text:
Fearless Puppy Plays With Giant English Mastiff Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
Gunner the English Mastiff is excited to meet and play with Hudson the puppy, but he (and his human) make sure that his giant size doesn’t intimidate the small pup. At 0:56 he even lies down and rolls on his belly to give Hudson a chance to “pounce”. 
Watch as Gunner gently plays with Hudson in this heartwarming clip and share it with your friends. Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook!
